backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing artworks, user profiles, image storage, and authorization with CRUD operations and ownership/admin checks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend components and hooks for routing, artwork management, UI, and permissions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme variables and global layout settings.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routing, authentication, artwork fetching, profile setup, and artwork detail dialog state.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Card UI informing unauthenticated users they must log in to upload and linking back to gallery.
Form for creating/editing artworks with image optimization, upload progress, and delete action in edit mode.
frontend/src/components/AppHeaderNav.tsx: Header navigation with a single Gallery button using hashâ€‘based routing.
frontend/src/components/ArtworkCard.tsx: Artwork card showing thumbnail, title, price, and optional sold badge or watermark.
frontend/src/components/ArtworkDetailDia: Displays a dialog with artwork details, image, edit and close controls, and supports optimistic sold-status toggling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity and handles auth state and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Shows a modal for entering and saving a user's name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries the backend to determine whether the authenticated caller is an admin, tied to the actor and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for CRUD operations on artworks, including fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and toggling sold status.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoute.ts: Manages routing via the URL hash, supporting gallery and upload views with optional edit parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useSoldDisplayPrefere: Stores and retrieves the user's preferred sold-display mode (badge or watermark) using localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/formatGBP.ts: Formats a bigint representing pence into a GBP currency string.
frontend/src/utils/imageOptimize.ts: Resizes and recompresses images exceeding size or dimension limits, returning optimized JPEG bytes and mime type.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL/hash.
frontend/src/views/GalleryView.tsx: Renders the artwork gallery with filtering for sold pieces and UI controls including optional upload shortcut.
frontend/src/views/UploadView.tsx: Displays upload or edit form for an artwork, loading existing data when in edit mode.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements to remove all delete actions from the gallery and keep deletion only on the edit page.
